references.reason: This paper introduced the attention mechanism, a key component of the proposed SNA module and a foundation for many recent advancements in deep learning.
This paper introduced neighborhood attention, a crucial baseline method compared against the proposed SNA module in the experiments.

references.paper_title: Learning a classification model for segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduced superpixels, which are fundamental to the proposed SNA module and a core component of its theoretical analysis.
This paper provides a state-of-the-art superpixel algorithm used in the experiments and theoretical analysis for the proposed SNA module.
This paper introduced the concept of superpixel pooling, which is used to evaluate the quality of superpixels learned in the experiments.
